title: Luxury House for Sale in Thalahena, Malabe.
details: Solidly built luxury house using high standard bricks & woods in Thalahena Malabe for sale. Very decent, calm & quite neighborhood. 400m to Thalahena Junction , 2.5 Km to Southern Highway and to Outer Colombo Highway and 1 km to Food city, Keels Supper market & Arpico supermarket.
